dct_description_sm: est Matth. Seutter ; Andreas Silbereisen sculps.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "Stadia", "Mille passus geometrici", "Milliaria unius horae", and "Dietae".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, territories of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
2 pictorial vignettes: [Israelites by river] -- [Israelites and an angel].
Inset map: Israelitarium ex Aegypto in promissam terram Canaan peregrinatio et mansiones per deserta, 40 ann. spatio confectae.
Appears in Seutter's Atlas geographicus oder accurate Vorstellung der ganzen Welt. Augsburg, 1725.
